description.narrative: The project locates in Moldova the poorest country in Europe where the reduction of poverty has stagnated and the level of inequality increased in the recent years. The project contributes to the development problem of the vulnerability of the youth which is manifested in youth unemployment and inactive citizenship causing hopelessness and social problems like substance abuse early sexual activity and as a consequence STDs and HIV. Mentally youth is susceptible to a range of economic physical and psychologi cal risks. The most vulnerable youth are those living in poor families in rural areas especially those with disabilities. The overall objective of the project is to create equal opportunities for vulnerable youth to make a living. The specific objective is to increase understanding and models and working methods of targeted youth support to promote the active citizenship and employability of the youth.The project promotes civil society's namely Moldovan Christian Aid and the churches it represents participa tion in poverty reduction and sustainable development by capacity building. This is achieved by raising awareness of social exclusion and marginalization of the youth and supporting activities to strengthen the capacity of civil society to support vulnerab le youth. Furthermore the project empowers the most vulnerable youth to become active citizens and strengthens networks with relevant stakeholders in the field.The project emphasizes the promotion of human rights gender equality the rights of the disabled and sustainable development. The project will provide a new way of thinking and doing by applying methods of participatory youth work in selected communities. The final beneficiaries of the project are the entire communities of the most vulnerable youth in 10 Edinet district villages.The key activities include supporting administration with well-developed monitoring systems, financial and administrative management, awareness raising of CSO personnel, on-site training by specialist in community development, training of local communities, development of outreach work and peer support system, production of working manual, empowering youth in life and non-formal skills, training of youth in citizenship, providing case management, organizing Youth Clubs, Youth Le adership Training, encouraging youth volunteering, organizing stakeholder consultation, searching synergies with other actors and organizing an international seminar.
